definition: snow pressed into a ball for throwing, increase or accumulate at a rapidly accelerating rate
details:
noun
- snow pressed into a ball for throwing
= example: snow pressed into a ball for throwing
- ball of crushed ice with fruit syrup
- ball of ice cream covered with coconut and usually chocolate sauce
- plant having heads of fragrant white trumpet-shaped flowers
= synonyms: sweet sand verbena
verb
- increase or accumulate at a rapidly accelerating rate
- throw snowballs at
